titles.title: To extend and modify the temporary suspension of duty on Desmodur R-E.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: 4/27/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to: (1) modify the article description of Desmodur R-E, and (2) extend temporarily the suspension of duty on such article.
